channel.title: Venice Reviews on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Venice Reviews on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Cover-Up’ Review: Laura Poitras and Mark Obenhaus’ Sharp, Sensitive Doc Brings Relentless Truth-Seeker Seymour Hersh Into Focus
item.description: In their out-of-competition Venice entry, the filmmakers profile the prominent investigative reporter, who’s still going strong at 88.
